data.eml:eml: Both non-type species of Molytophilus (Coleoptera: Curculionidae: Molytinae) are transferred to Oreoscotus

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Grebennikov, Vasily V. (2018): Both non-type species of Molytophilus (Coleoptera: Curculionidae: Molytinae) are transferred to Oreoscotus. Zootaxa 4418 (4): 393-396, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4418.4.6
